body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping           Click the logo above to be taken to the Cincinnati Convention & Visitor's Bureau   While the park does not have any concessions or vending machines or overnight facilities, there are plenty of local eateries and overnight accommodations that visitors can choose from.  Thanks to the Cincinnati Convention & Visitors Bureau, visitors to the park can find a comprehensive list of places to eat and places to stay in one convenient location. Area Campgrounds  Even though William Howard Taft NHS is a park in an urban setting, there are campgrounds and recreational facilities near the greater Cincinnati area. While the park does not have any camping facilities or accommodations, visitors can search the internet for local campgrounds near the park.  You can also visit recreation.gov for a list of federal recreational sites which offer camping facilities.
title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
